text.div:
map "https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/StructureMap/emcare.b18-21.symptoms.2m.m" = "emcare.b18-21.symptoms.2m.m"


uses "http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/StructureDefinition/sdc-questionnaireresponse" alias 'questionnaireResponse' as source
uses "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Bundle" alias 'Bundle' as target
uses "https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/StructureDefinition/observation" alias 'Observation' as target
uses "https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/StructureDefinition/emcareobservation" alias 'EmCare Observation' as produced

group bundletrans(source src : questionnaireResponse, target bundle : Bundle) {
  src -> bundle.id = uuid() "id";
  src -> bundle.type = 'batch' "type";
  src where src.item.where(linkId = 'EmCare.B18S1.DE01').exists() then {
    src ->  bundle.entry as entry,  entry.request as request,  request.method = 'POST',  entry.resource = create('Observation') as tgt then emcareobservationemcareb18s1de01(src, tgt) "DE01";
  } "emcareobservation";
  src where src.item.where(linkId = 'EmCare.B18S1.DE02').exists() then {
    src ->  bundle.entry as entry,  entry.request as request,  request.method = 'POST',  entry.resource = create('Observation') as tgt then emcareobservationemcareb18s1de02(src, tgt) "DE02";
  } "emcareobservation";
  src where src.item.where(linkId = 'EmCare.B20S1.DE01').exists() then {
    src ->  bundle.entry as entry,  entry.request as request,  request.method = 'POST',  entry.resource = create('Observation') as tgt then emcareobservationemcareb20s1de01(src, tgt) "DE01";
  } "emcareobservation";
  src where src.item.where(linkId = 'EmCare.B21S1.DE01').exists() then {
    src ->  bundle.entry as entry,  entry.request as request,  request.method = 'POST',  entry.resource = create('Observation') as tgt then emcareobservationemcareb21s1de01(src, tgt) "DE01";
  } "emcareobservation";
  src where src.item.where(linkId = 'EmCare.B21S1.DE06').exists() then {
    src ->  bundle.entry as entry,  entry.request as request,  request.method = 'POST',  entry.resource = create('Observation') as tgt then emcareobservationemcareb21s1de06(src, tgt) "DE06";
  } "emcareobservation";
}

group emcareobservationselectoneyesno(source src, target tgt) {
  src ->  tgt.identifier = create('Identifier') as CodeID,  CodeID.system = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/namingsystem-identifier-type',  CodeID.use = 'official',  CodeID.value = 'uuid',  CodeID.id = uuid() "id-emcareb18s1de01";
  src ->  tgt.encounter = src.encounter,  tgt.subject = src.subject,  tgt.meta = create('Meta') as newMeta,  newMeta.profile = 'https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/StructureDefinition/emcareobservation',  tgt.code = create('CodeableConcept') as concept,  concept.system = 'https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes',  concept.code = 'select_one yesno' "code-emcareb18s1de01";
  src.item as item where linkId = 'timestamp', item.answer as a -> tgt.issued = a "timestamp-emcareb18s1de01";
  src -> tgt.subject = src.subject "patient";
  src.item first as item where linkId = 'select_one yesno' then {
    item.answer first as a then {
      a where a.value = 'yes' -> tgt.status = 'final' "final-selectoneyesno";
      a where a.value = 'no' -> tgt.status = 'cancelled' "notfound-selectoneyesno";
    } "an-selectoneyesno";
  } "it-selectoneyesno";
}

group emcareobservationselectonedifficultyfeeding(source src, target tgt) {
  src ->  tgt.identifier = create('Identifier') as CodeID,  CodeID.system = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/namingsystem-identifier-type',  CodeID.use = 'official',  CodeID.value = 'uuid',  CodeID.id = uuid() "id-emcareb18s1de02";
  src ->  tgt.encounter = src.encounter,  tgt.subject = src.subject,  tgt.meta = create('Meta') as newMeta,  newMeta.profile = 'https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/StructureDefinition/emcareobservation',  tgt.code = create('CodeableConcept') as concept,  concept.system = 'https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes',  concept.code = 'select_one difficulty_feeding' "code-emcareb18s1de02";
  src.item as item where linkId = 'timestamp', item.answer as a -> tgt.issued = a "timestamp-emcareb18s1de02";
  src -> tgt.subject = src.subject "patient";
  src.item first as item where linkId = 'select_one difficulty_feeding' then {
    item.answer first as a then {
      a ->  tgt.value = a,  tgt.status = 'final' "val-selectonedifficultyfeeding";
    } "an-selectonedifficultyfeeding";
  } "it-selectonedifficultyfeeding";
}

  src ->  tgt.identifier = create('Identifier') as CodeID,  CodeID.system = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/namingsystem-identifier-type',  CodeID.use = 'official',  CodeID.value = 'uuid',  CodeID.id = uuid() "id-emcareb20s1de01";

  src.item first as item where linkId = 'select_one yesno' then {
    item.answer first as a then {
      a where a.value = 'yes' -> tgt.status = 'final' "final-selectoneyesno";
      a where a.value = 'no' -> tgt.status = 'cancelled' "notfound-selectoneyesno";
    } "an-selectoneyesno";
  } "it-selectoneyesno";
